overview: The work reflects an aspect of Egyptian culture and the Upper Egyptians as a major group in society, as a Upper Egyptian doctor invents a medicine that can create love among all spectrums of people.
tagline: It was written by Faisal Nada and directed by Mr. Radi. He also participated in the acting, Hala Sedky, Mohy Al-Din Abdel Mohsen and Hayatum, an interesting view.
title: El Sa3ayda Wasalo
